title: Scaling up Tontine
description: Tontine is a popular way usually for women to raise money for micro-business but they hardly scale up to more than a few tens of people.
solution: The Tontine could use Cardano to connect and participate to other tontines nation wide establishing multi-scale saving and lending rings.
experience: We are well inserted in associative life of Côte d'Ivoire but this is rather a call for action to build a multi-disciplinary team.
